languages.text: "Не стоит недооценивать волшебную силу клятв. Духи уважают тех, кто дает весомые обеты, это знает каждый на Фенрисе".
"Do not underestimate the magical power of oaths. The spirits respect those who make weighty vows — everyone on Fenris knows this."
languages.original_text: "Не стоит недооценивать волшебную силу клятв. Духи уважают тех, кто дает весомые обеты, это знает каждый на Фенрисе".

traits.locale_text: "Do not underestimate the magical power of oaths. The spirits respect those who make weighty vows — everyone on Fenris knows this."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do not underestimate the magical power of oaths. The spirits respect those who make weighty vows — everyone on Fenris knows this."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do not underestimate the magical power of oaths. The spirits respect those who make weighty vows — everyone on Fenris knows this."

traits.locale_text: "Do not underestimate the magical power of oaths. The spirits respect those who make weighty vows — everyone on Fenris knows this."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “不要低估誓言的魔力。精魂尊重那些许下沉重誓言的人，芬里斯每个人都清楚这一点。”
languages.original_text: "Do not underestimate the magical power of oaths. The spirits respect those who make weighty vows — everyone on Fenris knows this."

traits.locale_text: “不要低估誓言的魔力。精魂尊重那些许下沉重誓言的人，芬里斯每个人都清楚这一点。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Il ne faut jamais sous-estimer la puissance magique des serments. Ceux qui les prononcent sont grandement respectés par les esprits. Tout le monde le sait, sur Fenris. »
languages.original_text: "Do not underestimate the magical power of oaths. The spirits respect those who make weighty vows — everyone on Fenris knows this."

traits.locale_text: « Il ne faut jamais sous-estimer la puissance magique des serments. Ceux qui les prononcent sont grandement respectés par les esprits. Tout le monde le sait, sur Fenris. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «No subestime el poder mágico de los juramentos. Los espíritus respetan a quienes prestan juramentos costosos, eso lo sabe todo Fenris».
languages.original_text: "Do not underestimate the magical power of oaths. The spirits respect those who make weighty vows — everyone on Fenris knows this."

traits.locale_text: «No subestime el poder mágico de los juramentos. Los espíritus respetan a quienes prestan juramentos costosos, eso lo sabe todo Fenris».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「誓いのパワーを過小評価するな。霊魂は重い誓約を守るものに加護を与える…フェンリスの誰もが知ってることだ」
languages.original_text: "Do not underestimate the magical power of oaths. The spirits respect those who make weighty vows — everyone on Fenris knows this."

traits.locale_text: 「誓いのパワーを過小評価するな。霊魂は重い誓約を守るものに加護を与える…フェンリスの誰もが知ってることだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Unterschätzt die magische Kraft eines Eids nicht. Die Geister respektieren jene, die gewichtige Gelübde ablegen — das weiß auf Fenris jeder."
languages.original_text: "Do not underestimate the magical power of oaths. The spirits respect those who make weighty vows — everyone on Fenris knows this."

traits.locale_text: "Unterschätzt die magische Kraft eines Eids nicht. Die Geister respektieren jene, die gewichtige Gelübde ablegen — das weiß auf Fenris jeder."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Do not underestimate the magical power of oaths. The spirits respect those who make weighty vows — everyone on Fenris knows this."

languages.text: "Yeminlerin büyülü gücünü hafife alma. Ruhlar, ciddi yeminler edenlere saygı gösterir. Fenris'te bunu bilmeyen yoktur."
languages.original_text: "Do not underestimate the magical power of oaths. The spirits respect those who make weighty vows — everyone on Fenris knows this."

traits.locale_text: "Yeminlerin büyülü gücünü hafife alma. Ruhlar, ciddi yeminler edenlere saygı gösterir. Fenris'te bunu bilmeyen yoktur."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
